title: How to minimize side-effects post COVID vaccination
author: Varsha Balakrishnan
description: People can commonly experience certain symptoms like fever, weakness, body ache post COVID vaccination.Here are a few steps to minimise the discomfort caused by it.
cleaned_text: Jun 7, 2021 People can commonly experience certain symptoms like fever, weakness, body ache and pain at the injection spot post COVID vaccination. Canva Music works therapeutically to reduce stress hormones.It can also work as an excellent fatigue fighter. Canva Herbal tea with ginger, pepper and tulsi is the best for easing these symptoms due to its antibacterial, anti-inflammatory and analgesic properties. Canva Make sure to eat a handful of nuts and seeds which have high antioxidants in them to combat side effects.The other nutrients provide energy and cell production. Canva Exercise allows oxygen-rich blood to surge through the body to the heart, brain and muscles.Easy stretches can also help take care of arm soreness. Canva Getting enough sleep before and after the dose, along with some meditation will support your immunity and help you to manage your stress levels.Stress-free nature will help the vaccine to build antibodies faster. Canva Have enough proteins and other essential nutrients rich diet.Healthy eating habits will help you to overcome body weakness and aid in active recovery. Canva Drinking plenty of water can help to flush out toxins from the body.Add coconut water, juices and infused waters to your diet chart or routine to stay fit and fine. Canva The pain and the ache disappear on their own after a while but if it intensely discomforts you, you can manage it through medication.Don't self medicate yourself. Canva For the pain at the injection site, apply an ice pack or wet towel on the spot to reduce pain.Move your arm or exercise a bit to regulate the blood flow and minimise inflammation.
